mapper.select: SELECT sc.id AS id, sc.org_id AS orgId, sc.num AS num, sc.goods_id AS goodsId, sc.create_time createTime, sc.modify_time AS modifyTime, g.NAME AS goodsName, g.price AS goodsPrice, g.img AS goodsImg, g.info AS goodsInfo, g.total AS goodsTotal, g.is_online AS isOnline, g.spec AS spec, po.NAME AS orgName, g.source AS source, po.org_logo AS orgLogo FROM p_shop_cart sc LEFT JOIN p_goods g ON sc.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN p_pawn_org po ON sc.org_id = po.id WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId}
